titles.title: Recognizing the importance of improving the high school graduation rate of foster youth.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2110)
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
10/10/2007--Introduced.
Recognizes the importance of increasing the foster youth high school graduation rate. Expresses concern that such rate is currently too low. Supports efforts to improve such rate, including increased coordination between child welfare and educational agencies.
